bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with die pu shang sun 跌扑傷損， injury from a fall . Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 1 Recipe Entry zuo jing wan 左經丸 , pills to assist the conduits: 跌扑閃肭，外傷內損， 並皆治之 , “It cures [injuries from] falls , sprain, external and internal injuries alike”.

② Etiological Agent. of losing one’s balance and falling to the ground. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xiong qiong 芎藭 quotes Shi quan bo jiu fang 十全博救方 : 因跌扑舉重，損胎不安 , “Following a fall or having lifted something heavy, the fetus is injured and no longer calm”.
